The study investigate efficacy sodium cridanimod conjunction progestin therapy population patient recurrent persistent PrR-negative endometrial cancer . Eligible patient enrol study administer sodium cridanimod combination progestin therapy . Objective response assess 12 week interval . Patients treat 12 month period , follow additional 12 month follow period disease progression whichever occur first . Important objective study investigate effect sodium cridanimod conjunction progestin therapy level PrR tumor tissue correlate efficacy . To accomplish objective , patient enrol study undergo two tumor biopsy allow measurement PrR level tumor tissue treatment 4 week therapy .
